mapper.select: select count(*) as cnt from paper where code=#{code} and is_deleted='N'

insert into paper(m_id, title, bgcolor, pccolor, pcborderpx, pcbcolor, pcbradiuspx, code) values(#{id}, #{title}, #{bgColor}, #{pcColor}, #{pcBorderPx}, #{pcbColor}, #{pcbRadiusPx}, #{code}) returning pcc_seq
select pcc_seq, bgcolor, pccolor, pcbcolor, pcborderpx, pcbradiuspx, title, code, regdate, m_id from paper where m_id=#{id} and is_deleted='N' order by regdate
select count(*) from postcard where pcc_seq=#{seq} and is_deleted='N'
